original_text: He told his men to knock down the altars where people worshipped the idols of Baal. He broke into pieces the altars for incense that were near the other altars. He destroyed the Asherah poles, the idols and the images. He broke them all into very small pieces. He threw the bits over the graves of the people who had offered sacrifices to those false gods.
korean_text: 무리가 왕 앞에서 바알의 제단들을 헐었으며 왕이 또 그 제단 위에 높이 달린 태양상들을 찍고 또 아세라 목상들과 아로새긴 우상들과 부어 만든 우상들을 빻아 가루를 만들어 제사하던 자들의 무덤에 뿌리고

sentences.original_text: He told his men to knock down the altars
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그의 사람들에게 제단들을 부수라고 지시했다

sentences.original_text: where people worshipped the idols of Baal
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳은 사람들이 바알 우상을 숭배하던 곳이었다

sentences.original_text: He broke into pieces the altars for incense
that were near the other altars
sentences.korean_translation: 그 제단들은 다른 제단들 가까이에 있었다

sentences.original_text: He broke them all into very small pieces
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그것들을 모두 아주 작은 조각으로 부수었다

sentences.original_text: He threw the bits over the graves
of the people who had offered sacrifices
sentences.korean_translation: 그 무덤들은 제물을 바쳤던 사람들의 것이었다
